name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Dream Hyper Battle!
name_original: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Dream Hyper Battle!
description:
A 3D fighting game that covers the Kokuyo to Varia arcs of the anime.
Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! Dream Hyper Battle! is an Action game, developed and published by Marvelous Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2007.
